field.name: arkPistolTakedownArchetype
field.description: Replaces the default pistol archetype used when performing a pistol takedown on this NPC.

field.name: fMaxLookAngle
field.description: Max angle at which head look at offsets are applied for this character

field.name: fMaxAimAngle
field.description: Max angle at which aim offsets are applied for this character
